about_the_game:
GAZOLINAS is a new indie arcade racing game with a focus on physics, speed and competition. Forget road traffic rules – in GAZOLINAS, you'll be literally flying at half of a Mach speeds while collecting Drift Points and listening to catchy Drum and Bass music.

Key Features

  • Unique Leaderboards: Each race generates a code, pitting you against players worldwide.

  • Over 10 different environments and more than 30 race tracks

  • Garage: Tweak suspension, differential lock and paintjob for the perfect driving machine.

  • Drift System: Chain drifts, boost your multiplier, and beat the competition.

  • Online Play: Join or create your own server and drive together with your friends.

In GAZOLINAS, each session has its own Leaderboard code, automatically created according to the parameters of the race. This means you'll compete not only with your own results but also with other players from all over the world. In addition, all players compete in Global Leaderboards for highest speed, car mileage and more!

Garage

The garage allows you to fine-tune any of 4 cars according to the nature of the track and your driving style. Chassis height and stiffness will change the stability, grip, and center of gravity of the car. Wheel camber will allow for bigger corners, but it will make handling less sharp. Increasing the differential lock ratio increases acceleration but makes the car more prone to losing control and drifting. Get credits by leveling up, spend them on the Color Roulette and get a random paintjob!

Car dynamics

"AirRoll" key assignments control the car's orientation when the wheels are off the ground (roll and pitch). The Turbo key activates the car's boosted power and pushes it with such force that, under the right circumstances, the car can lift from the surface. Mastering these features will let you adjust your car mid-air for a perfect landing... or a liftoff!

Drift system

When you skillfully oversteer, you earn drift points, which are only counted while your wheels are on the asphalt. Chaining drifts adds current points to the existing ones and increases the multiplier. Additionally, the SpeedBoost multiplier activates at high speeds, multiplying your collected points even further.

Even more!

Tired of non-stop high octane intense racing? Get chill, relax and smash zombies, collect hidden stars, complete Steam Achievements or just take a spin in the Skatepark and do some cool acrobatics!

GAZOLINAS is developed by one person, so bugs may occur. You can report them, that would help me correct them as soon as possible. Thank you!

name: GAZOLINAS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Capable Video Card AMD/Intel/nVidia with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Capable Video Card AMD/Intel/nVidia with 8GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: GAZOLINAS is a physics-driven, high-octane arcade racer where you'll drift, tune, and race to the top of global leaderboards
supported_languages:
English*, Lithuanian*, French*, German*, Dutch*, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian*, Latvian*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
